translations: v.（因疼痛等）尖叫（yelp 的现在分词）
n.（因痛苦或惊慌而发出的）尖声急叫

sentences.sentence: "Excellent!" he shouted, yelping happily at the rain. "Now we'll see how this boat really performs!"
sentences.translation: “太好了！”他冲着雨高兴地喊着，“这下我们可以看看这艘船真正如何表现了！”

sentences.sentence: The little dog was yelping in the garden yet.
sentences.translation: 小狗还在花园里狺狺叫着。

sentences.sentence: He likes dogs, but I can never stand the yelping.
sentences.translation: 他喜欢狗，但我实在受不了那汪汪的叫声。
